title.v: Đặt hàng cho nhà cung cấp đã chọn

action.text:
&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(b.ma_thue) as ma_thue, c.thue_suat, a.ct_gia_dk, a.gia_chuan_nt, rtrim(a.so_tham_chieu) as so_tham_chieu into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d93$000000 a cross join dmvt b cross join dmthue c
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(b.ma_thue) as ma_thue, isnull(t1.thue_suat, 0) as thue_suat, a.ct_gia_dk, a.gia_chuan_nt, rtrim(a.so_tham_chieu) from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d93$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmthue t1 on b.ma_thue = t1.ma_thue '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
